action_item: Requirements - Document how group therapy sessions are recorded in NextGen.
notes: Clarify the process for documenting group therapy sessions and whether they should be entered into NextGen.

action_item: Requirements - Provide a spreadsheet template for documenting group attendance.
notes: Send a sample spreadsheet to capture attendance and participation for psychoeducational groups.

action_item: DrFirst/EPCS - Review the process for documenting family therapy sessions in NextGen.
notes: Ensure clarity on how family sessions are documented and billed in NextGen.

action_item: Interface - Demonstrate how group sessions are managed in Dr. Cloud.
notes: Show the functionality for adding clients to group sessions and documenting their attendance.

action_item: Reports - Create a productivity report to track group attendance and registration.
notes: Develop a report that shows the number of registered clients versus attendees for group sessions.

action_item: Requirements - Investigate the possibility of documenting non-client attendees in group sessions.
notes: Find a way to track community partners or other non-clients who attend group sessions.
